DOC.brief_title: Manual Cervical Distraction : Measuring Chiropractic Delivery Neck Pain Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose Manual Cervical Distraction ( MCD ) : Measuring Chiropractic Delivery Neck Pain Clinical Trial examine patient‐centered clinical biomechanical outcome , believability characteristic manually‐localized cervical distraction procedure treatment neck- neck-related arm pain disability . One challenge issue study manual therapy , include spinal manipulation ( SM ) , development sham and/or minimal intervention procedure suitable use control group clinical trial . With SM , active treatment require substantial physical contact study clinician study participant , either directly mechanical intermediary . Consequently , difficult introduce difference manual therapy procedure distinguish sham and/or minimal intervention active treatment , immediately obvious study participant . Another challenge issue train clinician deliver standardize SM treatment within specify force range . The muscle surround neck could alter force transmit cervical spine , could alter treatment effectiveness . The purpose pilot randomize controlled trial examine patient‐centered clinical , biomechanical , believability outcome characteristic manually‐localized cervical distraction procedure treatment neck neck-related arm pain disability . We also evaluate ability doctor chiropractic deliver MCD treatment within specify force range . An exploratory aim study evaluate EMG measurement MCD delivery .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age 18 70 year ( inclusive ) . Mechanical neck pain neckrelated upper extremity pain last least 4 week duration . Mechanical neck pain neckrelated upper extremity pain classify Quebec Task Force ( QTF ) 24 . Naïve flexiondistraction manual therapy procedure cervical area . Average neck pain past 24 hour rat 3 7 010 Pain Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) Phone Screen Baseline 1 Interview . Signed Informed Consent Document . Exclusion Criteria Doctor chiropractic current former chiropractic student . Average neck pain past 24 hour rat 02 810 010 Pain NRS Phone Screen Baseline 1 Interview . Neck pain somatic tissue determine history clinical examination . Surgery cervicalthoracic area within past 6 month . Recent fracture cervicothoracic spine rib within past 8 week . Injections pain neck , shoulder , arm hand past 4 week . Neck pain classify QTF 1 , 511 . Unwillingness postpone use type manual treatment neck pain , except provide study duration study . Inability unwillingness comply study protocol . Bone joint pathology represent contraindication study procedure . Any single multisegmental fusion ( surgical congenital ) 1st 7th cervical vertebra . Other safety concern determine clinical evaluation/opinion case review . Unable tolerate study procedure . Uncontrolled hypertension : systolic blood pressure ≥160 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≥100 mmHg . Simultaneous clinical management health condition compromise ability deliver study treatment ass health status . Inability read verbally comprehend English . Drug alcohol abuse dependence , suspect confirmed selfreport questionnaire clinical interview . Depression rat ≥ 29 Beck Depression Inventory . Cognitive memory impairment identify eligibility exam . Pregnancy , either follow 2 circumstance : 1 ) Participant safety , participant unable tolerate undergo study procedure ; 2 ) Fetus safety , xrays require diagnosis . Weight great 300 lb ( table weight limit ) . Referral evaluation , diagnosis , management health condition , additional diagnostics require neck pain diagnosis . Retention legal advice seek healthrelated insurance claim . Household member previously enrol MCD Clinical Trial . Compliance concern identify baseline eligibility process .
